jobDescription: RN Registered Nurse – OASIS – Home CareAre you looking for a rewarding position as a Home Care RN Registered Nurse? White Glove Placement, Inc. is currently seeking RN Registered Nurses for Oasis Visiting Nurse positions.Call us at 718-387-8181 Ext 202 or apply to this job to join our team of happy Registered Nurses!!At White Glove we are dedicated to make your Home Care – Visiting - RN Registered Nurse career rewarding! If you are an experience RN Registered Nurse, we would like to hear from you.As an Oasis Visiting Nurse - Registered Nurse with White Glove you will receive:The pay YOU deserveDirect Deposit – for your convenienceReferral Bonuses for referring your nurse friends24 Hour support by our caring teamAnd more!Requirements for RN Registered Nurse, Home Care Visiting Nurse:NYS RN LicenseCurrent or Recent Oasis experience as an RN Registered NurseRussian or Mandarin Speaking a plus[Related Keywords: rn, registered nurse, home care, home health, homecare, oasis, visiting nurse, healthcare, health care]
